messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Ok, I started it! (was re:Unschooling Podcast?)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/2006 12:44:44 AM Central Daylight Time, queana7@comcast.net writes: I made a first  edition of the new podcast!  It was pretty easy
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/2006 12:44:44 AM Central Daylight Time,
queana7@... writes:

I made a first edition of the new podcast! It was pretty easy once I got to
the recording part of it.
Please have a listen, and send feedback or suggestions for next time to
_unbridledlearning@..._ (mailto:unbridledlearning@...) Also, if you
think it is worthwhile, please feel free to let others know (I am only on so
many lists ;)
You can get to the show from my site listed in my signature, or go directly
there at _http://unbridledlearning.podomatic.com_
(http://unbridledlearning.podomatic.com/) Once you are there, click on download to get the audio file.
I am working on getting listed in itunes as well.
If there is interest, I will make more. I already have a couple posts I
like for the next one.
Thanks for the feedback so far J


I loved it thanks so much for doing it. Keep up the good work, i cant wait
to hear the next one.

~Alyssa
Slightly crunchy, unschooling Mom to Landen(2 1/2) and Gage(6 months)

"Work like you don't need the money, love like you've never been hurt, and
dance like you do when nobody's watching."



(http://lilypie.com/)

(http://lilypie.com/)



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
